ori-def: a certain small bird, less than a sparrow; variegated with a long tail; from whose cry future good or bad fortune may be presumed: if it cries out twice, or four times, it betokens misfortune; but if once, or thrice, or five times, then good success; if anything above this, it initiates a still greater blessing, according to the number of cries.

ori-def: paddy; used for that production in its various stages. Numatojóarien, as it just shoots forth. Minochûrgaro, as it puts forth a broad leaf. Tummaabbi-alallabach, as it has two leaflets on the side, and one on the top; a resemblance being supposed to lallabach, a green leek.  Madocka jû adda, as it is now, 1+1/2  or 2 spans high: gûmmasor, túmmûbaron summatis, when it has attained its full length. Tummedinnid, when the grain begins to form. Pûikon ja adda, when the grain is perfect and hangs bent down. Tummaberook ja adda, when the grain is half  ripe and nearly scorched.
ori-def_norm: paddy; used for that production in its various stages. numatojoarien, as it just shoots forth. minochurgaro, as it puts forth a broad leaf. tummaabbi-alallabach, as it has two leaflets on the side, and one on the top; a resemblance being supposed to lallabach, a green leek.  madocka ju adda, as it is now, 1+1/2  or 2 spans high: gummasor, tummubaron summatis, when it has attained its full length. tummedinnid, when the grain begins to form. puikon ja adda, when the grain is perfect and hangs bent down. tummaberook ja adda, when the grain is half  ripe and nearly scorched.

ori-def:

ori-def:
chinûmmalt, chachûmmalt, g. chatta. I. chattan, chinattan,
inochattan, to pay a ransom for a murderer: according to 
the old native custom, a pig for a man. Also to pay a fine 
for any misdeed. Pachalt, transit. to do as above: also 
simply to give back or repay one thing for another, like for 
like, whatever it be: chachalt, the punishment laid on any
one a ransom for murderer. Also the judgment that is 
annexed to murder. Atea *zi_sja o chachalt o tapos o cho,
the day of general judgment. Ma-achachalt, a ransomer;
that is, one who pays the ransom.
ori-def_norm:
chinummalt, chachummalt, g. chatta. i. chattan, chinattan,
inochattan, to pay a ransom for a murderer: according to 
the old native custom, a pig for a man. also to pay a fine 
for any misdeed. pachalt, transit. to do as above: also 
simply to give back or repay one thing for another, like for 
like, whatever it be: chachalt, the punishment laid on any
one a ransom for murderer. also the judgment that is 
annexed to murder. atea *zi_sja o chachalt o tapos o cho,
the day of general judgment. ma-achachalt, a ransomer;
that is, one who pays the ransom.

When is it high water? Chûmmat ja to, it is high water.

ori-def:

nok, to blow the nose.

ori-def:
zinumbor, tadûmbor, doborra, doborren, zinobor, inodoborren, padabor, transit. to take away 
against one's will: as maûpis, poas: ka sai dumbor na mochan ja mado, the dog has taken away my
food; to constrain another to do any thing, either willingly or not; to hold fast, and not to left go:
as madabdab, elli pittol o meacha, dombor o maùmali o meroos. Dûmbor o arribil, dûmbor o cho,
to force any one, to take any thing away: nomen. subst. daddobor, daddobor o ballag, depriving
another of his goods. Ma addobor, an oppressor, a tyrant.
ori-def_norm:
zinumbor, tadumbor, doborra, doborren, zinobor, inodoborren, padabor, transit. to take away 
against one's will: as maupis, poas: ka sai dumbor na mochan ja mado, the dog has taken away my
food; to constrain another to do any thing, either willingly or not; to hold fast, and not to left go:
as madabdab, elli pittol o meacha, dombor o maùmali o meroos. dumbor o arribil, dumbor o cho,
to force any one, to take any thing away: nomen. subst. daddobor, daddobor o ballag, depriving
another of his goods. ma addobor, an oppressor, a tyrant.

ori-def:
zinúmmarram, tadûmmarram, g: darrama, to practice one's self in any thing, is used both for teacher
and learner. Passi. darramen, dsimarran, inodarranmmen, dummarran, tûmmoch o bido, 
to practice one's self in reading; is verbum act: dûmmarram o sisjien o tûmmoch o bido, the children
exercise themselves in reading. Madarram, as maba. Padarram, dûminarram, acho maba. Dûmmarram
meach ta Deos, to practice one's self, or to learn to pray. Daddaram, nom. exercise. Daram, to exercise
one's self, nom. exercise. Taddaram, one who is practised. Daddarran o aiacha,a meeting for prayer. 
Ma adaddarram, one who exercises himself or another.

zinummarram, tadummarram, g: darrama, to practice one's self in any thing, is used both for teacher
and learner. passi. darramen, dsimarran, inodarranmmen, dummarran, tummoch o bido, 
to practice one's self in reading; is verbum act: dummarram o sisjien o tummoch o bido, the children
exercise themselves in reading. madarram, as maba. padarram, duminarram, acho maba. dummarram
meach ta deos, to practice one's self, or to learn to pray. daddaram, nom. exercise. daram, to exercise

ma adaddarram, one who exercises himself or another.

ori-def:
to deny, as with us, no: but it is only used in connection with another word: as elli mabisse oaseis.
your heart is not true. Elli pa, is so common that nothing can exceed it. and yet i do not know that is 
the real meaning of it (then what about me?????). It seems to signify that some thing is not in 
existence, as elli pa ja adda de assaban o amicien: or that some thing is not in one possession; as ellipa
ja oa bido ina-ai, the first of which I cannot otherwise understand than that "there is no rice in the village
on the north:" and the other "I have not got your book." See in alli.
ori-def_norm:
to deny, as with us, no: but it is only used in connection with another word: as elli mabisse oaseis.
your heart is not true. elli pa, is so common that nothing can exceed it. and yet i do not know that is 
the real meaning of it (then what about me?????). it seems to signify that some thing is not in 
existence, as elli pa ja adda de assaban o amicien: or that some thing is not in one possession; as ellipa
ja oa bido ina-ai, the first of which i cannot otherwise understand than that "there is no rice in the village
on the north:" and the other "i have not got your book." see in alli.

ibien marali, a snake with large eyes, matoto macha.

*ibien o atei, a snake that blows its cheeks up: mato a ri.
*ibien o boesûm korrokorron maûsi, snakes spotted with black and white.
*ibien tagotago de abas, korrokorroan mekach maûsi, mali kach ja ki-or, snakes found in the sea. spotted green and white with broad tails.

a snake.

*ibien o atei, a snake that blows its cheeks up: mato a ri.
*ibien o boesum korrokorron mausi, snakes spotted with black and white.
*ibien tagotago de abas, korrokorroan mekach mausi, mali kach ja ki-or, snakes found in the sea. spotted green and white with broad tails.

zh-def:
為該族的習俗。
語其他部落的居民訂定和平契約時，會扯下對方衣服上的一根草吃掉。
此舉為和平的象徵。
ori-def:
aan a tammas, or harri or man, aan, o rarozì, is the manner of the natives. when they will make a treaty
of peace with each other; they pluck a thread out of each other's clothes and eat it up; which is a sign
of peace: this contract is made midway between their villages.

ori-def: dead. Cho macha, a dead man; also, dried up. Macha da baron, dry wood. Macha da ta, dry land. Pacha, to kill, acti. imp. acha, achar, inûcha, ino achan, trans. ipacha, inipacha, inoipacha. ori-def: minachote, manachote; acho-tea, averse to any thing that is unpleasant. Also to suffer punishment. The root is chûmmote, see also act. pachote, in p. punishment. Maachote, a sufferer. chote, suffereing.
ori-def_norm: minachote, manachote; acho-tea, averse to any thing that is unpleasant. also to suffer punishment. the root is chummote, see also act. pachote, in p. punishment. maachote, a sufferer. chote, suffereing.

ori-def: mi, ma. achotulla, neutr. bent, not straight, physically and morally. Pachotul, act. et tran. pi, pa, imp. achotulla, ipachotulla, pas. ipachotul, &c. Chotul, a curve.
ori-def_norm: mi, ma. achotulla, neutr. bent, not straight, physically and morally. pachotul, act. et tran. pi, pa, imp. achotulla, ipachotulla, pas. ipachotul, &c. chotul, a curve.

ori-def: mi, ma, achúmmachûmma, indistinct, the opposite of marimasal. Chûmmachûmma, nom. Ma achûmmachûmma. Pachûmmachûmma, act. achûmmachûmma, achummachumman, inachummachumman, inoachummachumman, trans. ipachûmmachumma, pas. ipachummachûmma, &c.
ori-def_norm: mi, ma, achummachumma, indistinct, the opposite of marimasal. chummachumma, nom. ma achummachumma. pachummachumma, act. achummachumma, achummachumman, inachummachumman, inoachummachumman, trans. ipachummachumma, pas. ipachummachumma, &c.

ori-def: minada, mamada, ada, adan, inadan, inoadan,  to divide. Pada, trans. Ada, a share. Ma ada, a sharer.
ori-def_norm: minada, mamada, ada, adan, inadan, inoadan,  to divide. pada, trans. ada, a share. ma ada, a sharer.

ori-def: minadaap, mamadaap, adapa, dadpen, inadap, ino-adapen,  to make haste. Padaap, imp. ipadaba, trans. ada aba, acti. Pass. ada aben, inadaab, inoadaaben, padaab, inipadaab, inoipadaab, adaab, haste. Ma adaab, one who hastens another.
ori-def_norm: minadaap, mamadaap, adapa, dadpen, inadap, ino-adapen,  to make haste. padaap, imp. ipadaba, trans. ada aba, acti. pass. ada aben, inadaab, inoadaaben, padaab, inipadaab, inoipadaab, adaab, haste. ma adaab, one who hastens another.

ori-def: mi, ma, ada-alla, neutr. dishonourable, shameless. Pa-da-al, act. et trans. da-al, nom.
ori-def_norm: mi, ma, ada-alla, neutr. dishonourable, shameless. pa-da-al, act. et trans. da-al, nom.

ori-def: to be satisfied, mi, ma, adabbia. Padabbi, trans. satisfied, dabbi, satiety. Ma adabbi, a satisfier. Adabbi, satisfying, act. Padabbi, act. adabbia, adabbin, trans. ipadabbia, pas. ipadabbi, inipadabbi, ino adabbien, inoipadabbi.
ori-def_norm: to be satisfied, mi, ma, adabbia. padabbi, trans. satisfied, dabbi, satiety. ma adabbi, a satisfier. adabbi, satisfying, act. padabbi, act. adabbia, adabbin, trans. ipadabbia, pas. ipadabbi, inipadabbi, ino adabbien, inoipadabbi.

ori-def: ininadaddo, mamadaddo; adaddoa, to refuse: pas. adadoan, inadadoan, adaddoan. Padad, daddo, a refusal. Ma adaddo, a refuser.
ori-def_norm: ininadaddo, mamadaddo; adaddoa, to refuse: pas. adadoan, inadadoan, adaddoan. padad, daddo, a refusal. ma adaddo, a refuser.

ori-def: g: mi, ma, adaldalla, gentle, as ma-allal. Padaldal, pa-al-al, trans. Daldal, mildness. Ma-adaldal, one who wishes to be kind. Padaldal, act. adaldalla, adaldallen, inadaldal, paal-al, trans. imp, ipadaldalla, pas. ipa-daldal, inipadaldal, inoadaldallen.
ori-def_norm: g: mi, ma, adaldalla, gentle, as ma-allal. padaldal, pa-al-al, trans. daldal, mildness. ma-adaldal, one who wishes to be kind. padaldal, act. adaldalla, adaldallen, inadaldal, paal-al, trans. imp, ipadaldalla, pas. ipa-daldal, inipadaldal, inoadaldallen.

ori-def: mi, ma, neutr. glistering, shinning, as if well scoured: but this only refers to any thing that has a white ground, and differs from raosan.Dallolees, nom. a shining, it is also the name of a tree, the bark of which shines like the European beech.
ori-def_norm: mi, ma, neutr. glistering, shinning, as if well scoured: but this only refers to any thing that has a white ground, and differs from raosan.dallolees, nom. a shining, it is also the name of a tree, the bark of which shines like the european beech.

ori-def: minadarram, mamadarram, adarrama, darrammen, madarram, inodarrammen, trained; see the root dummarram, and there the neutr. daram, experience. Ma-adarran, one who is trained.
ori-def_norm: minadarram, mamadarram, adarrama, darrammen, madarram, inodarrammen, trained; see the root dummarram, and there the neutr. daram, experience. ma-adarran, one who is trained.

ori-def: minadas, mamadas, adassa, adassen, inoadassen, to praise. Madadas, also padas, praise. Ma-adas, a praiser.
ori-def_norm: minadas, mamadas, adassa, adassen, inoadassen, to praise. madadas, also padas, praise. ma-adas, a praiser.

ori-def: minaddik, mamaddik, adikka, &c. to forbid. Paddik. Adik, a prohibition. Ma adik, a prohibiter.
ori-def_norm: minaddik, mamaddik, adikka, &c. to forbid. paddik. adik, a prohibition. ma adik, a prohibiter.

ori-def: mi, ma g: addoborra, busy, encumbered, neutr. Padobor, trans. Ma-adobor, troubled. Adobor, trouble, act. dobbor, care. Padobor, act. adoborra, adoborren, inadobor, trans. imp. padoborra, pas. padobor, &c.
ori-def_norm: mi, ma g: addoborra, busy, encumbered, neutr. padobor, trans. ma-adobor, troubled. adobor, trouble, act. dobbor, care. padobor, act. adoborra, adoborren, inadobor, trans. imp. padoborra, pas. padobor, &c.

ori-def: sick, mi, ma, adicha, nom. adject. Ma-adig, a sickness, one who makes sick, Adigh, a sickening. Dich, nom. sickness. Madeadig, intend. nom. Padich, act. adicha, adich, inadich, trans. ipadicha, pas. ipadich, inipadich, inoadichen, inoipadich, &c.
ori-def_norm: sick, mi, ma, adicha, nom. adject. ma-adig, a sickness, one who makes sick, adigh, a sickening. dich, nom. sickness. madeadig, intend. nom. padich, act. adicha, adich, inadich, trans. ipadicha, pas. ipadich, inipadich, inoadichen, inoipadich, &c.

ori-def: a dog.
ori-def_norm: a dog.

ori-def: mi, ma, g: adiddena, firm, close, fast holding.Madidden o arrar, a strong railing. Adidden ja tataap-oe, hold it dast. Applied to the mind, firm undaunted. Dadden, firm. Pa-didden, trans. Ma adidden, one who makes fast: adidden, a fastening. Pa-didden, act. adiddena, &c. trans. padiddna, pas. ipadidden, &c.
ori-def_norm: mi, ma, g: adiddena, firm, close, fast holding.madidden o arrar, a strong railing. adidden ja tataap-oe, hold it dast. applied to the mind, firm undaunted. dadden, firm. pa-didden, trans. ma adidden, one who makes fast: adidden, a fastening. pa-didden, act. adiddena, &c. trans. padiddna, pas. ipadidden, &c.

ori-def: minadirdir, mamadirdir, adirdirra, to tremble. Padirdir, act. et trans. dirdir, nom. a shaking
ori-def_norm: minadirdir, mamadirdir, adirdirra, to tremble. padirdir, act. et trans. dirdir, nom. a shaking

ori-def: minado, mamado, adoa, adoan, inadoan, inoadoan,  to cook. Pado, trans. Ado, a cooking. Ma ado, a cook.
ori-def_norm: minado, mamado, adoa, adoan, inadoan, inoadoan,  to cook. pado, trans. ado, a cooking. ma ado, a cook.

ori-def: minadobdob, mamadobdob; dobdobba, dobdobben, zinobdob, inodobdobben, hurried and in difficulty. Padobdob, trans. See dûmmobdob, to hasten, neutr. nom. dobdob. Ma adobdob, one who hastens another.
ori-def_norm: minadobdob, mamadobdob; dobdobba, dobdobben, zinobdob, inodobdobben, hurried and in difficulty. padobdob, trans. see dummobdob, to hasten, neutr. nom. dobdob. ma adobdob, one who hastens another.

ori-def: minadochallam, mamadochallam, adochallama, the calming and clearing up of wind and weather; also of anger. Padochallam, act. et trans. imp. adochallam, adochallaman. ipadochallama, pas. ipadochallam, inadochellaman, inoadochalleman, inipadochallam, inoipadochallam. Adochallam. Ma adochallam, one who calms people.
ori-def_norm: minadochallam, mamadochallam, adochallama, the calming and clearing up of wind and weather; also of anger. padochallam, act. et trans. imp. adochallam, adochallaman. ipadochallama, pas. ipadochallam, inadochellaman, inoadochalleman, inipadochallam, inoipadochallam. adochallam. ma adochallam, one who calms people.

ori-def: Madodevbo-ibo, faint, weak; mi, ma, adodeibo-iboa, lax. Padodeibo-ibo, trans. et act. imp. adodeibo-iboa, adodeibo-iboan, inadodeibo-iboan, &c. pas. ipadodeiboibo, &c. Adodeibo-ibo, faintness. Ma adodeiboibo, one who makes faint.
ori-def_norm: madodevbo-ibo, faint, weak; mi, ma, adodeibo-iboa, lax. padodeibo-ibo, trans. et act. imp. adodeibo-iboa, adodeibo-iboan, inadodeibo-iboan, &c. pas. ipadodeiboibo, &c. adodeibo-ibo, faintness. ma adodeiboibo, one who makes faint.

zh-def: 如馬車輪子般的扁平圓形
ori-def: mi, ma, gareogera, flat, and round like the wheels of a coach. Pagareogeo, tran. et act. nom. gareogeo.
ori-def_norm: mi, ma, gareogera, flat, and round like the wheels of a coach. pagareogeo, tran. et act. nom. gareogeo.

ori-def: and magagri, mi, ma, both neutr. from chûmmagids and gûmmagri, ticklish.
ori-def_norm: and magagri, mi, ma, both neutr. from chummagids and gummagri, ticklish.

ori-def: minaggaga, &c. see magga, to throw after. Maggag o bato, to stone.
ori-def_norm: minaggaga, &c. see magga, to throw after. maggag o bato, to stone.

ori-def: the eyes
ori-def_norm: the eyes

ori-def: mi, ma, agaiecha, neutr. from gummaiech, to delay. Aguiech, lateness, used adverbially. late. Ma agaiech, a delaying, adject.
ori-def_norm: mi, ma, agaiecha, neutr. from gummaiech, to delay. aguiech, lateness, used adverbially. late. ma agaiech, a delaying, adject.

ori-def: mi, ma, agakka, pass. agakken, &c. to call out, as pallieb. Pagak, trans. intend. magagak, agak, nom.
ori-def_norm: mi, ma, agakka, pass. agakken, &c. to call out, as pallieb. pagak, trans. intend. magagak, agak, nom.

ori-def: mi, ma, unsettled, changeable: mi, ma, agchitagchitatta, is not said of men's will or words, but refers to things that exist now and then, as magchitagchitat moetas, it rains some times.  Agchitagchitat, changeableness.
ori-def_norm: mi, ma, unsettled, changeable: mi, ma, agchitagchitatta, is not said of men's will or words, but refers to things that exist now and then, as magchitagchitat moetas, it rains some times.  agchitagchitat, changeableness.

ori-def: minagga, mamagga, agga, the means in order to an end, yaga, miagga, inojagga, the object or aim; agan, inagan, inoaggan, to throw out of the hand. Maggo taggargar, to cast anchor. Paga, trans. Aga, the throwing of projectiles. Ma aga, one skilful in throwing.
ori-def_norm: minagga, mamagga, agga, the means in order to an end, yaga, miagga, inojagga, the object or aim; agan, inagan, inoaggan, to throw out of the hand. maggo taggargar, to cast anchor. paga, trans. aga, the throwing of projectiles. ma aga, one skilful in throwing.

ori-def: Maggo-aan, mi, ma, aggo-ana, compounded of magga, to throw, and ann, food; when tow parties, after having promised their children, previous to the marriage, feed each other. Paggo-an, trans. aggo-aan, nomen. subst.
ori-def_norm: maggo-aan, mi, ma, aggo-ana, compounded of magga, to throw, and ann, food; when tow parties, after having promised their children, previous to the marriage, feed each other. paggo-an, trans. aggo-aan, nomen. subst.

ori-def: mi, ma, sharp: agaata, pointed. Maggaat o zinoe, a sharp knife: maggaato raro, a three cornered hat. Maggagaat, intend. from gummaat. Gaat, a point. Ma agaat, any thing pointed.
ori-def_norm: mi, ma, sharp: agaata, pointed. maggaat o zinoe, a sharp knife: maggaato raro, a three cornered hat. maggagaat, intend. from gummaat. gaat, a point. ma agaat, any thing pointed.

ori-def: mi, ma, imp. aggea, tough, sticky, paste made from rice, starch, &c.
ori-def_norm: mi, ma, imp. aggea, tough, sticky, paste made from rice, starch, &c.

ori-def: mi, ma, aggocha, to annoy by vexation. Maggogh ja na, azijel o mababat, maggoghja, maggogh ja na babiaro machip. Pagoch, trans. goch, vexation. Ma agoch, vexer. Pagoch, act. agocha, &c. trans. ipagocho, &c.
ori-def_norm: mi, ma, aggocha, to annoy by vexation. maggogh ja na, azijel o mababat, maggoghja, maggogh ja na babiaro machip. pagoch, trans. goch, vexation. ma agoch, vexer. pagoch, act. agocha, &c. trans. ipagocho, &c.

ori-def: mi, ma. agossa, to fish with a sweep net, bu which the fishes are inclosed. Pagos, transi.
ori-def_norm: mi, ma. agossa, to fish with a sweep net, bu which the fishes are inclosed. pagos, transi.

ori-def: mi, ma to bend any thing on the edge or end, as the edge of a napkin, &c. Also to go slanting upwards, as a way. Pagotarrar, trans. et act. imp. agotarrarra, agotarrarran, ipagotarrarra, pas. ipagotarrar, &c.
ori-def_norm: mi, ma to bend any thing on the edge or end, as the edge of a napkin, &c. also to go slanting upwards, as a way. pagotarrar, trans. et act. imp. agotarrarra, agotarrarran, ipagotarrarra, pas. ipagotarrar, &c.

ori-def: Magoûlyk, mi, ma, agoulyka, neutr. to sprain the foot, to wrench. Pagoûlyck, act. et trans. a sprain of the foot. The natives cure this by the leaves of a certain tree, called satik, with which they bind up the limb in order to soften the skin, or to disperse the extravasated blood.
ori-def_norm: magoulyk, mi, ma, agoulyka, neutr. to sprain the foot, to wrench. pagoulyck, act. et trans. a sprain of the foot. the natives cure this by the leaves of a certain tree, called satik, with which they bind up the limb in order to soften the skin, or to disperse the extravasated blood.

ori-def: mi, ma, agomacha, neutr. blotted out. See gûmmach.
ori-def_norm: mi, ma, agomacha, neutr. blotted out. see gummach.

ori-def: mi, ma, agoracha, the skin rubbed off; magoragh ja rima, the skin is off my hand. Magar aggorach, intend.
ori-def_norm: mi, ma, agoracha, the skin rubbed off; magoragh ja rima, the skin is off my hand. magar aggorach, intend.

ori-def: mimai, mamai, imp. moa, to come. the 3rd person has sai, sanai, sasai, trans. only in the 3rd person, pasai, pi, pa: ipasaya. Mai, is he well? interrogatively.
ori-def_norm: mimai, mamai, imp. moa, to come. the 3rd person has sai, sanai, sasai, trans. only in the 3rd person, pasai, pi, pa: ipasaya. mai, is he well? interrogatively.

ori-def: Mai-acho, all those who are related to us, whether male or female; also step father and mother. Seems to be compounded from the verbs Mai, to come, and macho, to bring; because when the daughters marry, they bring their husbands home to dwell.
ori-def_norm: mai-acho, all those who are related to us, whether male or female; also step father and mother. seems to be compounded from the verbs mai, to come, and macho, to bring; because when the daughters marry, they bring their husbands home to dwell.

ori-def: alike: mi, ma, imp. aubasa, aibas, nom. likeness. Ma aibas, one who makes alike. Paibas act. et trans. imp. aibasa, aibasan, inaibasan, inoaibasan, ipaibasa, ipaibas, &.
ori-def_norm: alike: mi, ma, imp. aubasa, aibas, nom. likeness. ma aibas, one who makes alike. paibas act. et trans. imp. aibasa, aibasan, inaibasan, inoaibasan, ipaibasa, ipaibas, &.

ori-def: minaibat; mamaibat, aibadda, aibaddan, inaibaddan, ino-aibaddon, to work for another for one's board. as the poor do for a meal. Men say also mikat. Paibar, trans. with respect to the person who is served; aibat, nom. service. Maibat, a servant, a labourer. Pas. aibadden, inaibda, inaibadden, inaibad, inoaibadden, with respect to the hire that is obtained.
ori-def_norm: minaibat; mamaibat, aibadda, aibaddan, inaibaddan, ino-aibaddon, to work for another for one's board. as the poor do for a meal. men say also mikat. paibar, trans. with respect to the person who is served; aibat, nom. service. maibat, a servant, a labourer. pas. aibadden, inaibda, inaibadden, inaibad, inoaibadden, with respect to the hire that is obtained.

ori-def: mi, ma, small, fine; but it is only said of many, for with regard to few it is keuzi; also than not thick. As makied. Paied, to make small. Ma-a-ied, or makikied, thin, Pa-i-ied, pakikied, trans.
ori-def_norm: mi, ma, small, fine; but it is only said of many, for with regard to few it is keuzi; also than not thick. as makied. paied, to make small. ma-a-ied, or makikied, thin, pa-i-ied, pakikied, trans.

ori-def: Ma-allas, calm, cleared up; is said of wind and weather, also of the feelings. Pa-allas, act. et trans. imp. a-allassa, a-allassen, ina-allassen, ino-a-allassen, ipallassen, ina-allassen, ino-a-allassen, ipallassa. &c. Allas, nom. calmness, clearness. Ma-a-allas, a soother.
ori-def_norm: ma-allas, calm, cleared up; is said of wind and weather, also of the feelings. pa-allas, act. et trans. imp. a-allassa, a-allassen, ina-allassen, ino-a-allassen, ipallassen, ina-allassen, ino-a-allassen, ipallassa. &c. allas, nom. calmness, clearness. ma-a-allas, a soother.

ori-def: Ma-im-it, makiki, idem. Me-imimit, intend. makilikili, idem. middling, not too much, passable, neither too large nor too small. Is also used as machapor, and machapochapor, and then means moderate in conversation, neigher too still, nor too talkative.
ori-def_norm: ma-im-it, makiki, idem. me-imimit, intend. makilikili, idem. middling, not too much, passable, neither too large nor too small. is also used as machapor, and machapochapor, and then means moderate in conversation, neigher too still, nor too talkative.

ori-def: kagmairo, mi, ma, aiman, airoan, airoa, inairoan, ino airoan, to change; as men do the teeth, or bucks the horus. Pairo, trans. nom. airo, a changing. Ma-airo, a changer.
ori-def_norm: kagmairo, mi, ma, aiman, airoan, airoa, inairoan, ino airoan, to change; as men do the teeth, or bucks the horus. pairo, trans. nom. airo, a changing. ma-airo, a changer.

ori-def: minais, mamais, assa, aisan, inaisaa, inoaisan, to laugh. Pais, transais, a laugh. Ma-ais, a laugher.
ori-def_norm: minais, mamais, assa, aisan, inaisaa, inoaisan, to laugh. pais, transais, a laugh. ma-ais, a laugher.

ori-def: Ma-issal, mina-issal mama-issal, a-is-salla, to repeat, as children do before their master. Ma-issal o bido, to say out of book. Ma-issal o sies, to say by heart.
ori-def_norm: ma-issal, mina-issal mama-issal, a-is-salla, to repeat, as children do before their master. ma-issal o bido, to say out of book. ma-issal o sies, to say by heart.

ori-def: mi, ma, aizia, near, at hand: people say also maizi, aizi, and arri, neighbourhood. Aizi, paizi, act. and trans. amp. aizia, aizian, inaizi, inoaizian, ipaizia, pas. ipaizi, inoipaize. Maaizi, nom. and ma arzi, one who brings near.

ori-def: mi, ma, akabollan, to be angry, to chide, ace. trans. Pakabol, akabolla, akabollen, pak-bolla, pas. ipakobol, inakobol, inoakobollen, &c. Kobol, anger, wrath. Ma-akabol, angry, wrathful.
ori-def_norm: mi, ma, akabollan, to be angry, to chide, ace. trans. pakabol, akabolla, akabollen, pak-bolla, pas. ipakobol, inakobol, inoakobollen, &c. kobol, anger, wrath. ma-akabol, angry, wrathful.

ori-def: minakagh, mamakagh, akacha, akachen, &c. to bite. Pagach, trans. Agach, a bite. Ma agach, a biter.
ori-def_norm: minakagh, mamakagh, akacha, akachen, &c. to bite. pagach, trans. agach, a bite. ma agach, a biter.

ori-def: minagagach, mamagagagh, agagagcha, to itch after, to desire strongly. Magagagagach, intend. magagach. Pagagach, trans. gagach, an itching, a disire. Ma-agagach, one who itches.
ori-def_norm: minagagach, mamagagagh, agagagcha, to itch after, to desire strongly. magagagagach, intend. magagach. pagagach, trans. gagach, an itching, a disire. ma-agagach, one who itches.

ori-def: Ma-kairi, mi, ma, to do any thing with the left hand; as makairi ja simioch, pattite, &c. Ma annigh, idem. Ma akairi, a left handed man.
ori-def_norm: ma-kairi, mi, ma, to do any thing with the left hand; as makairi ja simioch, pattite, &c. ma annigh, idem. ma akairi, a left handed man.

ori-def: Ma-kallamas, mi, ma, to do any thig with the right hand; as makallamas ja simioch, pattite, &c. Ma allamas, do.
ori-def_norm: ma-kallamas, mi, ma, to do any thig with the right hand; as makallamas ja simioch, pattite, &c. ma allamas, do.

ori-def: to be red; mi, ma, akakama, pakakam, trans. et act. imp. akalanna, ipakakanna, kakan, redness. Ma akakan, a red dauber. Pass. akakanna, inakakannan, ipakakan, inikakannan, inipakakan, inokakannan, &c.
ori-def_norm: to be red; mi, ma, akakama, pakakam, trans. et act. imp. akalanna, ipakakanna, kakan, redness. ma akakan, a red dauber. pass. akakanna, inakakannan, ipakakan, inikakannan, inipakakan, inokakannan, &c.

ori-def: agamgamma, to be covetous. Pass: minagamgam, fut. mamagamgam. Ma agamgam, covetous, a miser. Gamgam, covetousness. Pagamgam, act. trans. imp. agagmgamma, agamgammen, ipagam?amma, pas. ipagamam, inagamgammen,&c.
ori-def_norm: agamgamma, to be covetous. pass: minagamgam, fut. mamagamgam. ma agamgam, covetous, a miser. gamgam, covetousness. pagamgam, act. trans. imp. agagmgamma, agamgammen, ipagam?amma, pas. ipagamam, inagamgammen,&c.

ori-def: to be solitary, alone; mi, ma, akammigia. Pakammieg. trans. et act. imp. akammichia, akammichiin, inakammichi, inoakammichi-in, ipakimmichia, pas. ipakimmichi, &c. Kammichi, so itude. Maakammigi, one who is solitary and alone.

ori-def: mi, ma, to be covetous. (as magamgam) akammocha, imp. Pakammoch, act. trans. imp. akammocha, akammochan, ipakammocha, pas. ipakammoch, inakammo inoakammochan, inipakammioch

ori-def: mi, ma, akapossa, close, ped up. Also clownish, incapable of understanding. Makapos atsies: kûmmapos. Pakapos, act. et kapos, a closing up. Makapos thing stopped up.
ori-def_norm: mi, ma, akapossa, close, ped up. also clownish, incapable of understanding. makapos atsies: kummapos. pakapos, act. et kapos, a closing up. makapos thing stopped up.

ori-def: mi, ma, akakossia, disobedient. Pakakossi, pi, pa, kossia, akakossi-in, inakakossi, i?kossia, pas. ipakakossi, inipaka?fut. pass. inoakakossi-in inoipak?si; see act. kummossi, to render one disobedient.
ori-def_norm: mi, ma, akakossia, disobedient. pakakossi, pi, pa, kossia, akakossi-in, inakakossi, i?kossia, pas. ipakakossi, inipaka?fut. pass. inoakakossi-in inoipak?si; see act. kummossi, to render one disobedient.

ori-def: minakaries, mamakaries?riba, to run; written magarieb. garieb, trans. pas. agarieban, rieb, inoagarieban, a circle in ?men run. Ma-agarieb, a runne?
ori-def_norm: minakaries, mamakaries?riba, to run; written magarieb. garieb, trans. pas. agarieban, rieb, inoagarieban, a circle in ?men run. ma-agarieb, a runne?

ori-def: mi, ma, akapiera, nertr. hooked on: kapier, a hook, Mapier, adject. hooked to.
ori-def_norm: mi, ma, akapiera, nertr. hooked on: kapier, a hook, mapier, adject. hooked to.

ori-def: mi, ma, makarrichi, m?karrichi, akarrichia, to quarrel snarl. Pakarrichi, trans imp. i?richia, pass. ipakarrichi, inipa?chi, inoipakarrichi, pass. aka?ipakarrichi, inoakarrichi-in. Ka? a quarrelling. Ma-akarrichi, angry. Mizy, idem.
ori-def_norm: mi, ma, makarrichi, m?karrichi, akarrichia, to quarrel snarl. pakarrichi, trans imp. i?richia, pass. ipakarrichi, inipa?chi, inoipakarrichi, pass. aka?ipakarrichi, inoakarrichi-in. ka? a quarrelling. ma-akarrichi, angry. mizy, idem.

ori-def: mi, ma akinkinna, neutr. to ring as little bells; see kûmminkin, nom. kinkin, a little bell.
ori-def_norm: mi, ma akinkinna, neutr. to ring as little bells; see kumminkin, nom. kinkin, a little bell.

ori-def: mi, ma, akarroa, as mausse-lakko. Pakarro, to be idle, act. akarro, nom. Ma-akarro, a lazy fellow. Pass. akarroan, akarroan o tsinoep aarrien, the work is neglected.

ori-def: mi, ma, akirkirra, neutr. see kûmmirkir, to gnash the teeth. Pakirkir, act et trans. Akirkir, a gnashing of the teeth.
ori-def_norm: mi, ma, akirkirra, neutr. see kummirkir, to gnash the teeth. pakirkir, act et trans. akirkir, a gnashing of the teeth.

ori-def: mi, ma, akiolla, as maggaat. Kiol, nom. pointed. Makiol ja oog pama dol, a pointed bamboo, tapering towards the top. Ma-akiol, any thing pointed. Pakiol, trans. et act. to sharpen to a point imp. akiolla. pakiollen, inakiollen, inoakiollen, ipakiolla, &c.
ori-def_norm: mi, ma, akiolla, as maggaat. kiol, nom. pointed. makiol ja oog pama dol, a pointed bamboo, tapering towards the top. ma-akiol, any thing pointed. pakiol, trans. et act. to sharpen to a point imp. akiolla. pakiollen, inakiollen, inoakiollen, ipakiolla, &c.

ori-def: ma, mi, akkassa, akkassen, inakkas, inoakkassen, to revile any one, to accuse, to reproach. Pakkas, trans. Makkas o ma atattosik, to accuse falsely. Akkas, a reviling. Maakkas, a reviler.
ori-def_norm: ma, mi, akkassa, akkassen, inakkas, inoakkassen, to revile any one, to accuse, to reproach. pakkas, trans. makkas o ma atattosik, to accuse falsely. akkas, a reviling. maakkas, a reviler.

ori-def: proper, just, suitable, sufficient; mi, ma, akkieshappa. Keshap and akkeshap, nom. Ma-akkeshappa, act. et trans. pakkeshap, imp. akkeshappa, akkeshappen, inakkeshappen, inoakkeshappen, ipakeshappa, &c.

ori-def: Makosûm, to be jet black, mi, ma, akosûmma. Pakosum, paosûm; trans. et act. imp. aosûmma, aosum, inaosûm, ipoasumma, pass. ipaosum, &c. Osum, blackish. Ma-aosum, blackener.
ori-def_norm: makosum, to be jet black, mi, ma, akosumma. pakosum, paosum; trans. et act. imp. aosumma, aosum, inaosum, ipoasumma, pass. ipaosum, &c. osum, blackish. ma-aosum, blackener.

ori-def: minalabagh, mamalabagh, choosing things equally good, not to know which to take, imp. allabagha. Ma allabagh, act. et trans. Pallabagh, pi, pa, allabagha, allabaghen, ina-al-labaghen, inoallabaghen, ipallabacha, ipallabagh, iaipallabagh, inoipallabagh. But Mabag, mi, ma, abagga, abaggen, inabag, not to know what to choose, to be anxious about a choice. Palag, abag, nom. Ma-abag, one who brings another into anxiety.
ori-def_norm: minalabagh, mamalabagh, choosing things equally good, not to know which to take, imp. allabagha. ma allabagh, act. et trans. pallabagh, pi, pa, allabagha, allabaghen, ina-al-labaghen, inoallabaghen, ipallabacha, ipallabagh, iaipallabagh, inoipallabagh. but mabag, mi, ma, abagga, abaggen, inabag, not to know what to choose, to be anxious about a choice. palag, abag, nom. ma-abag, one who brings another into anxiety.

ori-def: mi, ma,alaga, alagen, &c. to catch, to surprise one in sleep, as the natives catch game while asleep, or pierce them with a spear.
ori-def_norm: mi, ma,alaga, alagen, &c. to catch, to surprise one in sleep, as the natives catch game while asleep, or pierce them with a spear.

ori-def: Malakkûm, minallakkûm, mamallakkûm, allakkûmma, to turn things upside down. Allakkûm, the turning as of a ruler. Ma-allakkûm, one that does that. Pallakkûm, pi, pa, imp. act. et trans all kkumma, ip llakumma, allakkûmman, inallakkûmman, inoallakkûmman, , pas. ipallakkûm, &c. To turn things over and over, but is only said of such things as nature or art has adapted for tunring over.

ori-def:
minan, maman, channa, channan, incchan, to eat away, to wear.
Poan, pi, pa, to feed, to give to eat, imp.
ipanna, channea, pass.
channan, imnan, inochannan, with respect to the person who is fed.
But iporan, inipoan, inoipoan, with respect to the food one eats.
Nom. from man, is inochan, food. 
From pan, is aan, feeding, a meal, and ma-aan, a feeder.
Karri, man-aan, to feed one another.
Aan o marpe, supper.
Maggo-aan, to feed.
Man o paissina, breakfast.
Man o lallian, dinner.
Man o maroop, supper.

ori-def:
without any thing, deprived of everything. Ta Deos marotul ja bog, God is incorporeal, i.e.
without a body, *pr. iut. ma, nom. deprivation, see the root rummûtul. Ma-arotul, one who is destitute. 
The Favorlang people do not use this word thus, but as the end of a chair, or table; 
still it comes to the same thing, for where any thing ends. there it exists no more.

without any thing, deprived of everything. ta deos marotul ja bog, god is incorporeal, i.e.
without a body, *pr. iut. ma, nom. deprivation, see the root rummutul. ma-arotul, one who is destitute. 
the favorlang people do not use this word thus, but as the end of a chair, or table; 
still it comes to the same thing, for where any thing ends. there it exists no more.

minatincho, is said of the sea water,
 when it stands still between ebb and flood, because the sea then appears swollen.

It betokens also a little putrid, because when any thing begins to stink it swells up.

Mé-aab, mineaab, mameaab, eaba, ea ban, inoaban, inoeaban, to precede a
nother in doing a thing; hence meaab mabá, to know, before hand, meab paha, to preconceive. Meapattis, to foretell. From meaab-maba, nomen, aijaab-maba, foreknowledge. From meaab-nmita, nom. aijaab-mita, prescience. From meaab-pattite, nom. aijaab-patite, prophecy. From meeaab-merab, nom, aijaab-merab, predetermination. From meaab-meries, nom. aijaab-meries, preparation. And is in other cases

me-aab, mineaab, mameaab, eaba, ea ban, inoaban, inoeaban, to precede a

ori-def: Mórich, minorich, mántorich, oricha, orichen, &c. to live, to maintain one's life. Porich, trans, to support, feed, and maintain another, nom. porich, is not in use for being, but means maintenance, feeding.

ori-def: Morich, mi, ma, oricha, neutr, has no noun, as morich, to keep alive. Porich, pi, pa, oricha, pass, orichen, inorich, ino-orichen, to feed. Aurich, a feeding; ma-aurich, a feeder. Paurich, pi, pa, ipaûricha, pass. ipáurich, inipaurich, inoipaûrich, to make lively; also to cure of disease.
ori-def_norm: morich, mi, ma, oricha, neutr, has no noun, as morich, to keep alive. porich, pi, pa, oricha, pass, orichen, inorich, ino-orichen, to feed. aurich, a feeding; ma-aurich, a feeder. paurich, pi, pa, ipauricha, pass. ipaurich, inipaurich, inoipaurich, to make lively; also to cure of disease.

ori-def: Morich, mi, ma, origha, the growing of the body, pas, orichan, &c. Aûrich, nom. a growing. Porich, idem, ût sûpra, to feed another. Hence maaurich, such a feeder. Paurich, ùt súpra, to provide for another.
ori-def_norm: morich, mi, ma, origha, the growing of the body, pas, orichan, &c. aurich, nom. a growing. porich, idem, ut supra, to feed another. hence maaurich, such a feeder. paurich, ùt supra, to provide for another.

ori-def: Pa, a word of denial. Patzi, there is no fish. Joined with nouns, it means to make, as pacha-och, to make a grave.Also to do ary thing, as paûcho, to louse; but mixed with other words it means to cause to do, as Papiech, to cause to fight unjustly. Pabórra, to pacify; or to suspect or accuse any one, as pachab, to accuse of theft. Pachod, one who raises an unjust suspicion.
ori-def_norm: pa, a word of denial. patzi, there is no fish. joined with nouns, it means to make, as pacha-och, to make a grave.also to do ary thing, as paucho, to louse; but mixed with other words it means to cause to do, as papiech, to cause to fight unjustly. paborra, to pacify; or to suspect or accuse any one, as pachab, to accuse of theft. pachod, one who raises an unjust suspicion.

pinûarpa, papûarpa, aarpa, ipa-arpa,
ûarpanni, inûarpan, inoaarpanni, to join one's self to any society. Cho Abasshe pinaarpó Batshekan, those of Abasshe have joined with Batshekan. Paarpa o dippi, to weld iron together. Nota, paarpa requires that the ends come over or into one another. See summasoom.

pinuarpa, papuarpa, aarpa, ipa-arpa,

Babósa, pa-oabi, the sower; adda ipa-oûbi, it is sown; Bonnaaoabian, it was sown. Aoûbi, a sowing. Aoûbian, aoabi aijan, the sowing season, or place.

ori-def: pinûra, papara, arû, arûn, inara, inoaran, to be with any one, to accompany; araosse ta Cabba oe, does Cabba keep company? Ara, a comrade, pas. aran, inaran, to be accompanied: this passive is used with respect to those who attend on any one, as Takaba aran o Takalla, i.e. Takabba is waited on by Takala; or Takaba inara o icho, i. e. Takabba is attended by him; and aran, is also taken for the person who serves, that is the servant and maid.
ori-def_norm: pinura, papara, aru, arun, inara, inoaran, to be with any one, to accompany; araosse ta cabba oe, does cabba keep company? ara, a comrade, pas. aran, inaran, to be accompanied: this passive is used with respect to those who attend on any one, as takaba aran o takalla, i.e. takabba is waited on by takala; or takaba inara o icho, i. e. takabba is attended by him; and aran, is also taken for the person who serves, that is the servant and maid.

ori-def: pinarab, paparab, iparaba, to impregnate, to get with child: see rummab, the transitive of which this is, and means, to impregnate, or to cause a woman to be pregnant, while rummab, betokens the receiver. And raben, the child; rinab is received.
ori-def_norm: pinarab, paparab, iparaba, to impregnate, to get with child: see rummab, the transitive of which this is, and means, to impregnate, or to cause a woman to be pregnant, while rummab, betokens the receiver. and raben, the child; rinab is received.

ori-def: pinaraba, papûraba, ara, aran, inara, inoaran, from Para, to adopt as a child, also to give up for that purpose; in which case it is ipûraba-a, iparaba. Paraba, act. and trans. The child rûmmaka, takes another for his father. The real father lets the child be taken by another. Paraba choa, refers to those who take the child; it is also said Paraba, to take a child. An adopted father raba amosjiem. The real father iparabo. The child is called by the adopten father, aran.
ori-def_norm: pinaraba, papuraba, ara, aran, inara, inoaran, from para, to adopt as a child, also to give up for that purpose; in which case it is ipuraba-a, iparaba. paraba, act. and trans. the child rummaka, takes another for his father. the real father lets the child be taken by another. paraba choa, refers to those who take the child; it is also said paraba, to take a child. an adopted father raba amosjiem. the real father iparabo. the child is called by the adopten father, aran.

ori-def_norm: pinarullibal, paparullibal, baralliballa, barullibal, binarallibal, inobarallibal, to put out linen, &c. to dry. but has not such an extensive meaning as porra; pabarallibal, to do thus.

ori-def: pinûssoso, papûssoso, assosoa, to whom ? assosoan, inassosoûn, inoassosoan, to give, to present, to give for nothing: what ? ipassos, inipassoso, inoipassoso, ditto. Passok, pi, pa, imp. assokka, from whence seems to be derived the name of the village Assok, which is the noun, from the verb passok, meaning a gift; because the site of the village Assok was formerly given to the inhabitants of Tamachan. Psaoso, trans. a gift.
ori-def_norm: pinussoso, papussoso, assosoa, to whom ? assosoan, inassosoun, inoassosoan, to give, to present, to give for nothing: what ? ipassos, inipassoso, inoipassoso, ditto. passok, pi, pa, imp. assokka, from whence seems to be derived the name of the village assok, which is the noun, from the verb passok, meaning a gift; because the site of the village assok was formerly given to the inhabitants of tamachan. psaoso, trans. a gift.

ori-def:

also a quadruped. But whenever this word is used for a slave, it is always
employed in a bad sense.

to make any one for a labourer or slave. also to do thus, in which case

employed in a bad sense.

whenever there are fish therein. Aila, nom. a hitting.

ori-def:
irraba, irraban, &c. to weed, to pull up the weeds or grass out of the streets or places 
near the houses. But to weed fields is ummo-o; nevertheless this difference exists
between the two, that Pirraba is used when people gather the weeds from amongst the
good seed, but ummo-o when people pull up weeds out of a field, where no no good seed
has been sown.

between the two, that pirraba is used when people gather the weeds from amongst the
good seed, but ummo-o when people pull up weeds out of a field, where no no good seed
has been sown.

zh-def: 反對，做任何相反的事情
ori-def: sinummopat, sasummopat, sopatta, sopatten, sinopat, inosopatten, to be over against, to do anything in opposition. Pasopat, pinasopat, papû-sopat, &c. to cause such to be done. Sasopat over againt: this word is joined with karri and mau, as (karri-sasopat) and means to be over against each other: thus karrisasopat patodon, to live opposite to each other. Summapat o meroos, o pattite, to sit or speak one over against the other.
ori-def_norm: sinummopat, sasummopat, sopatta, sopatten, sinopat, inosopatten, to be over against, to do anything in opposition. pasopat, pinasopat, papu-sopat, &c. to cause such to be done. sasopat over againt: this word is joined with karri and mau, as (karri-sasopat) and means to be over against each other: thus karrisasopat patodon, to live opposite to each other. summapat o meroos, o pattite, to sit or speak one over against the other.

ori-def: tsinassinan, inotassinan, tassioa, to do anything for any one. Inatassinan ja rûmmozi-daû tamau, I will pay for my father. In the 2nd and 3rd person people do not say Tassinan, but Tassi. It is necessary that this word be examined. It is to be written tas-ina, just as daû-ina, for me; so also tasi-je, for you; tas-icho, for him. Præt. tsinas. fut. inosas, imp. tas ioa, sie d'r fas joa ina, take my place.

P** &c. to cause such to be done. ** comes aurri a teiba, that is the ** money given when people work together, as if they said, aúrëdda a teiba, so that this noun seems to come from moriedda and tummûiba, to work together. For they say also, Moriëdda o taiba, and Moribal o taibe, to leave offm to cease such working together.

zh-def: 在任何地方採取行動，或是激發、發揮自己的力量
ori-def: zinummalpon, tatummalpon, talponna, talponnan, zinalponnan, inotalponnan, to betake one's seld any where, or set forward. Also to stir one's self up, and exert one's strength. **talpou, pi. pa. ipûtalponna, ipatalpon, &c. to cause such to be done.
ori-def_norm: zinummalpon, tatummalpon, talponna, talponnan, zinalponnan, inotalponnan, to betake one's seld any where, or set forward. also to stir one's self up, and exert one's strength. **talpou, pi. pa. iputalponna, ipatalpon, &c. to cause such to be done.

ori-def: zinummallo, tatummallo, talloa, talloon, zinalloon, inotalloon, to allure, to bait. Patallo, pinatallo, papatallo. &c. to cause to allure.
ori-def_norm: zinummallo, tatummallo, talloa, talloon, zinalloon, inotalloon, to allure, to bait. patallo, pinatallo, papatallo. &c. to cause to allure.

ori-def: zinummattal, tatummattal, tattallan, zinattal, inotattallan, to trample with feet. Pûtattal, pinatattal, papatattal, ipatattalla, ipatattal, inipa- &c. to cause such to be done.
ori-def_norm: zinummattal, tatummattal, tattallan, zinattal, inotattallan, to trample with feet. putattal, pinatattal, papatattal, ipatattalla, ipatattal, inipa- &c. to cause such to be done.

zh-def: 遮掩自己或他人以產生汗水
ori-def: zinummallumtum, tatummallumtum, inotallumtum, to cover up one's self or another in order to produce perspiration. Patallumtum, pi. pa. ipatallumtumma, &c.
ori-def_norm: zinummallumtum, tatummallumtum, inotallumtum, to cover up one's self or another in order to produce perspiration. patallumtum, pi. pa. ipatallumtumma, &c.

ori-def: zinummanna, tatummanna, tanna, tanuaan, zinanna, inotannaan, to open. Tanna osja chachab o donoe, open the door of the house. Patanna, pi. pa. ipatanna, &c. to cause to open. Tattannanna o parara, an opening to let ** light, that is, a window.
ori-def_norm: zinummanna, tatummanna, tanna, tanuaan, zinanna, inotannaan, to open. tanna osja chachab o donoe, open the door of the house. patanna, pi. pa. ipatanna, &c. to cause to open. tattannanna o parara, an opening to let ** light, that is, a window.

ori-def: zinummao, tatummao, taoa, taoan, zinaoan, inotaoan, to sprinkle, as with water, salt thin m*d, &c. but to cover wood, stone, and other thhings that do not spread is magga. Wherewith * itaoon, inoitaoon. Patao, pinatao, papatao, ipatatoa, ipatao, inipatao, &c. to cause such to be done.
ori-def_norm: zinummao, tatummao, taoa, taoan, zinaoan, inotaoan, to sprinkle, as with water, salt thin m*d, &c. but to cover wood, stone, and other thhings that do not spread is magga. wherewith * itaoon, inoitaoon. patao, pinatao, papatao, ipatatoa, ipatao, inipatao, &c. to cause such to be done.

ori-def: zinummammoos, tatummammoos, itammosa, itammoos, initammoos, inoitammoos, to crumble, to shred. Patammoos, pi. pa. ipat*mmosa. ipatammoos. &c. to cause such to be done. Tummammoos, means to stick anything in the mouth.
ori-def_norm: zinummammoos, tatummammoos, itammosa, itammoos, initammoos, inoitammoos, to crumble, to shred. patammoos, pi. pa. ipat*mmosa. ipatammoos. &c. to cause such to be done. tummammoos, means to stick anything in the mouth.

ori-def: zinummapacha, tatummapacha, tapacha, tapachanni, and tapachaiyan, zinapachanni and zinapachayan. inotapachanni and inotapachayan, to put on one's breeches. Patapacha, pi. pa. &c. to cause such to be done.
ori-def_norm: zinummapacha, tatummapacha, tapacha, tapachanni, and tapachaiyan, zinapachanni and zinapachayan. inotapachanni and inotapachayan, to put on one's breeches. patapacha, pi. pa. &c. to cause such to be done.

ori-def: tsi. tat. tapalla, tapallan, tninapal, inotapallan, to stumble in the way. Patapal, trans. nom. tattapal.
ori-def_norm: tsi. tat. tapalla, tapallan, tninapal, inotapallan, to stumble in the way. patapal, trans. nom. tattapal.

zh-def: 像人們洗衣服一樣用棍子拍打，以打落灰塵
ori-def: zinummapies, tatummapies, tapisa. tapisen. zinapies, inotapisen, to beat with a stick, as people do their their clothes, in order to knock dust or dirt. Patapies, zinatapies, papatapies, &c. to cause such to be done.
ori-def_norm: zinummapies, tatummapies, tapisa. tapisen. zinapies, inotapisen, to beat with a stick, as people do their their clothes, in order to knock dust or dirt. patapies, zinatapies, papatapies, &c. to cause such to be done.

ori-def: zinummapitapies, tatummapitapies, inotapitapisen, to beat with many strokes. Patapitapies, pi. pa. &c. to cause such to be done.
ori-def_norm: zinummapitapies, tatummapitapies, inotapitapisen, to beat with many strokes. patapitapies, pi. pa. &c. to cause such to be done.

zh-def: 選擇砍伐一塊田地；選擇一位女士
ori-def: tsi. tat. tara, taran, tsirara, inotaran, to choose anything first: as tummar' o mioa, tummar o mammali balach, to choose to cut down a field; to choose a lady. Patara, trans. ta*ara, a choice. Hence karri tatta-a, mau tat-ta-a, to choose one another.
ori-def_norm: tsi. tat. tara, taran, tsirara, inotaran, to choose anything first: as tummar' o mioa, tummar o mammali balach, to choose to cut down a field; to choose a lady. patara, trans. ta*ara, a choice. hence karri tatta-a, mau tat-ta-a, to choose one another.

zh-def: 把撒在地板上的東西集合起來，例如散落在地上的米
ori-def: zinummarad, tatummarad, taradda, taradden, zinarad, inotaradden, to gather up what another has scattered, as rice thrown over the floor. Patarad, pi. pa. ipataradda, ipatarad, &c. to cause wuch to be done.
ori-def_norm: zinummarad, tatummarad, taradda, taradden, zinarad, inotaradden, to gather up what another has scattered, as rice thrown over the floor. patarad, pi. pa. ipataradda, ipatarad, &c. to cause wuch to be done.

zh-def: 在這裡和那裡，彼此分散，這裡有一些，那裡也有一些
ori-def: tsi. tat. tamaramarra, tamaramarren, tsinaramar, inotaramarren, to be here and there, separated from one another, some here and some there. Pataramar, trans. such a scattering.
ori-def_norm: tsi. tat. tamaramarra, tamaramarren, tsinaramar, inotaramarren, to be here and there, separated from one another, some here and some there. pataramar, trans. such a scattering.

zh-def: 像草，植物和其他小東西一樣舞動
ori-def: tsi. tat. taratralla, to wave as grass, plants, and other little things do, &c. differs from lummitallito. Parakal, trans.
ori-def_norm: tsi. tat. taratralla, to wave as grass, plants, and other little things do, &c. differs from lummitallito. parakal, trans.

ori-def: same as dummarau. Patarau, pi. pa. ipataraua, &c. as Padarau.
ori-def_norm: same as dummarau. patarau, pi. pa. ipataraua, &c. as padarau.

ori-def: same as dummaraudau. Patarautau. pi. pa. same as padaraudau.
ori-def_norm: same as dummaraudau. patarautau. pi. pa. same as padaraudau.

ori-def: tsi. tat. tariesa, to intercept any one in his way. Pataries, trans. Tummariës o azies, to intercept the enemy. Nom. tattariës, an intercepting. Ma-atattaries, a hard runner, who overtakes another.
ori-def_norm: tsi. tat. tariesa, to intercept any one in his way. pataries, trans. tummaries o azies, to intercept the enemy. nom. tattaries, an intercepting. ma-atattaries, a hard runner, who overtakes another.

zh-def: 改變非常相似的事物，以至於人們很容易將它誤認為另一種，有意圖的欺騙
ori-def: zinummaroggi, tatummaroggi, taroggia, taroggian. zinaroggian, inotaroggian, to change things which are so much alike that they can be easily mistaken one for the other, and this with intent to deceive. Pataroggi, pinataroggi, papataroggi, ipataroggia, &c. to cause such to be done.
ori-def_norm: zinummaroggi, tatummaroggi, taroggia, taroggian. zinaroggian, inotaroggian, to change things which are so much alike that they can be easily mistaken one for the other, and this with intent to deceive. pataroggi, pinataroggi, papataroggi, ipataroggia, &c. to cause such to be done.

ori-def: tsi. tat. taromman, tsinaromman, inotaromman, to betray. Pataromma, trans. tattaromma, treachery. Hence karri-tattaromma, mautattanom-ma. Ma-atattaromma, a traitor.
ori-def_norm: tsi. tat. taromman, tsinaromman, inotaromman, to betray. pataromma, trans. tattaromma, treachery. hence karri-tattaromma, mautattanom-ma. ma-atattaromma, a traitor.

zh-def: 用扇子遮蓋住自己，以防日曬雨淋，沒有完全遮蓋住。或用地毯或類似物覆蓋，不同於 tummakkoob
ori-def: zinummaroob, tatummaroob, tarroba, tarroban, zinarroban, inotarroban, to cover as people do the head with a fan, to pretect them from sun or rain: thus not entirely covered. Or to cover with a rug or such like in which it differs from tummakkoob. Tatarroob, pi. pa. ipatarroba, &c. to cause to cover.
ori-def_norm: zinummaroob, tatummaroob, tarroba, tarroban, zinarroban, inotarroban, to cover as people do the head with a fan, to pretect them from sun or rain: thus not entirely covered. or to cover with a rug or such like in which it differs from tummakkoob. tatarroob, pi. pa. ipatarroba, &c. to cause to cover.

ori-def: tsi. tat. imp. tarossa, to pick anything here and there, just as people pluck the ripe ears in a field. Patarros, trans.
ori-def_norm: tsi. tat. imp. tarossa, to pick anything here and there, just as people pluck the ripe ears in a field. patarros, trans.

ori-def: zinummassal, tstummassal, *assalla, tassallen, sinassal, inotassal*en, to catch at once, to apprehend. Patassal, pi. pa. ipatassalla, &c. to cause such to be done. Tattasal, nom.
ori-def_norm: zinummassal, tstummassal, *assalla, tassallen, sinassal, inotassal*en, to catch at once, to apprehend. patassal, pi. pa. ipatassalla, &c. to cause such to be done. tattasal, nom.

ori-def: zinummassin, tatummassin, *assina, tassin, zinassin, inotassin, to entertain any one. Patassin, pi. pa. *patassin, inipatassina, inoipatassin, to cause such to be done. Tattassin, *n expectation, hope.
ori-def_norm: zinummassin, tatummassin, *assina, tassin, zinassin, inotassin, to entertain any one. patassin, pi. pa. *patassin, inipatassina, inoipatassin, to cause such to be done. tattassin, *n expectation, hope.

ori-def: zinummatas, tatummatas, ta*asa, tatasan, zinatas, inotatasan, to fathom. Patatas, pi. pa. ipatatasa, &c. to cause to be fathomed. Tatas, a fathom.
ori-def_norm: zinummatas, tatummatas, ta*asa, tatasan, zinatas, inotatasan, to fathom. patatas, pi. pa. ipatatasa, &c. to cause to be fathomed. tatas, a fathom.

ori-def: zinummatta, tatummatta, tat-*a, tittan, zinattan, inotattan, to stamp *eed out of the husk. Patatta, pi. pa. patatta, inipatatta, inoipatatta, to cause to be stamped out. Tatta, a *ice stamper.
ori-def_norm: zinummatta, tatummatta, tat-*a, tittan, zinattan, inotattan, to stamp *eed out of the husk. patatta, pi. pa. patatta, inipatatta, inoipatatta, to cause to be stamped out. tatta, a *ice stamper.

ori-def: zinummattam, tatummattam, tattamma, tattammen, zinattam, *notattammen, to hold fast. Patattam, pi. pa. ipatattamma, ipatattam, &c. to cause to hold fast.
ori-def_norm: zinummattam, tatummattam, tattamma, tattammen, zinattam, *notattammen, to hold fast. patattam, pi. pa. ipatattamma, ipatattam, &c. to cause to hold fast.

zh-def: 第一個做任何事情，無論是喝酒，說話還是品嚐食物
ori-def: zinummau-aab, tatummau-aab, tauba and taûmasan, taûba and *aûmasan, tsinauaban and tsinauma*an, inotaulan and inotaumasan, to do anything first or before another, whether drinking, speaking, or tasting. Patau-aab, pi. pa. ipatauaba, ipatauaab, &c. to cause such to be done, as mananat. Tattau-aab, or tau-aab. nom. subst is used adverbially as before.
ori-def_norm: zinummau-aab, tatummau-aab, tauba and taumasan, tauba and *aumasan, tsinauaban and tsinauma*an, inotaulan and inotaumasan, to do anything first or before another, whether drinking, speaking, or tasting. patau-aab, pi. pa. ipatauaba, ipatauaab, &c. to cause such to be done, as mananat. tattau-aab, or tau-aab. nom. subst is used adverbially as before.

ori-def: zinummauka, tatummauka, tauka, taukan, zinauka, inotaukan, to do anything over again. Patauka, pinatauka, papatauka, ipatauka, inipatauka, inoipatauka, to cause such to be done. Tummaukauka, zi. ta. to increase Tummauka. Pataukauka, &c. as patauka.
ori-def_norm: zinummauka, tatummauka, tauka, taukan, zinauka, inotaukan, to do anything over again. patauka, pinatauka, papatauka, ipatauka, inipatauka, inoipatauka, to cause such to be done. tummaukauka, zi. ta. to increase tummauka. pataukauka, &c. as patauka.

ori-def: same as tummauka. Pataula, same as patauka. Gummalich, idem. nom gagallich: pagallich, idem, mon. gagallich.
ori-def_norm: same as tummauka. pataula, same as patauka. gummalich, idem. nom gagallich: pagallich, idem, mon. gagallich.

zh-def: 經常做某事；使某事經常被完成
ori-def: zinummaulaula, tatummaulaula, taulaula, zinaulaula, inotaulaulan, to do anything very often; same as Tummaukauka. Pataulaula, pi. pa. &c. as Pataukauka,  to cause anything to be done frequently. Gummalle_allich, idem. Pagallegallich, id.
ori-def_norm: zinummaulaula, tatummaulaula, taulaula, zinaulaula, inotaulaulan, to do anything very often; same as tummaukauka. pataulaula, pi. pa. &c. as pataukauka,  to cause anything to be done frequently. gummalle_allich, idem. pagallegallich, id.

ori-def: zinummaumasa, tatummaumasa, taumasa, taumasanni and taumasayan, zinaumasanni and zinaumasayan, same as Matinnaam. Pataumasa, pi, pa, ipataumasa, inipûtaumasa, inoipataumasa, same as patinnaam.
ori-def_norm: zinummaumasa, tatummaumasa, taumasa, taumasanni and taumasayan, zinaumasanni and zinaumasayan, same as matinnaam. pataumasa, pi, pa, ipataumasa, iniputaumasa, inoipataumasa, same as patinnaam.

ori-def: zinummauraya, tatummauraya, tauraya, taurayan, zinaurayan, inotaurayan, to put into a fright. Patauraya, pi, pa, ipûtaûraya, inipatauraya, inoipatauraya, to cause to be afraid.
ori-def_norm: zinummauraya, tatummauraya, tauraya, taurayan, zinaurayan, inotaurayan, to put into a fright. patauraya, pi, pa, iputauraya, inipatauraya, inoipatauraya, to cause to be afraid.

ori-def: tsinumme, tatumme, tea, teen, tene, inoteen, to angle. Pûte, pinate, papate, ipatea, ipate, inipate, inoipate, to cause thus to fish. Tatte, nom.
ori-def_norm: tsinumme, tatumme, tea, teen, tene, inoteen, to angle. pute, pinate, papate, ipatea, ipate, inipate, inoipate, to cause thus to fish. tatte, nom.

ori-def: tsinûmmea, tatummea, te-a, te-ûan, tene-a, inote-aûn, to punish. Pûtea, pinatea, papûtea, ipûte-û, inipate-a, inoipatea, to cause such to be done. Tattea, nomen, that wherewith people punish, or the punishment itself.
ori-def_norm: tsinummea, tatummea, te-a, te-uan, tene-a, inote-aun, to punish. putea, pinatea, paputea, ipute-u, inipate-a, inoipatea, to cause such to be done. tattea, nomen, that wherewith people punish, or the punishment itself.

ori-def: tsi. tat. tsänna, tsean, tsinean, inoteän, same as tûmmaiba. Patsan, trans. Tean, nom.
ori-def_norm: tsi. tat. tsanna, tsean, tsinean, inotean, same as tummaiba. patsan, trans. tean, nom.

ori-def: tsinummear, tatummear, ettear, inetear, inoetear, to draw forth, to drag along. Pûtear, pinatear, papatear, ipatearra, ipatearen, inipatear, inoipatear, to cause to be dragged. Tattear, nom. a drawing forth; this word is also applied to the poles of a cart, between which an ox is fastened, in order to draw it.
ori-def_norm: tsinummear, tatummear, ettear, inetear, inoetear, to draw forth, to drag along. putear, pinatear, papatear, ipatearra, ipatearen, inipatear, inoipatear, to cause to be dragged. tattear, nom. a drawing forth; this word is also applied to the poles of a cart, between which an ox is fastened, in order to draw it.

ori-def: tsinummear, tatummear, tearra, tearren, tsinear, inotearren, to support, to prop up. Patear, pinatear, papatear, ipatearra, ipatear, inipatear, inoipatear, to cause such to be done. Tattear, a prop.
ori-def_norm: tsinummear, tatummear, tearra, tearren, tsinear, inotearren, to support, to prop up. patear, pinatear, papatear, ipatearra, ipatear, inipatear, inoipatear, to cause such to be done. tattear, a prop.

ori-def: zinummeer, tatummeer, tera, terin, zineer, or tineer, inoterin, to avoid, to shun either a stab, or a blow. Pateer, pinateer, papateer, ipatera, ipateer, inipateer, inoteer, to cause to avoid.
ori-def_norm: zinummeer, tatummeer, tera, terin, zineer, or tineer, inoterin, to avoid, to shun either a stab, or a blow. pateer, pinateer, papateer, ipatera, ipateer, inipateer, inoteer, to cause to avoid.

ori-def: zinummenon, tatummenon, tinnona, tinnonnen, zininnon, inotonnonnen, also tinnonnan, zininnonnan, inotinnonnan, to weave. Patinnon, pi, pa, ipatinnonna, ipatinnon, inipatinnon, inoipatinnon, to cause to weave.
ori-def_norm: zinummenon, tatummenon, tinnona, tinnonnen, zininnon, inotonnonnen, also tinnonnan, zininnonnan, inotinnonnan, to weave. patinnon, pi, pa, ipatinnonna, ipatinnon, inipatinnon, inoipatinnon, to cause to weave.

zh-def: 用手掌或手臂靠在某物上
ori-def: zinummepar, tatummepar, teparra, teparran, zineparran, inoteparran, to lean on anything with the hand or arm. Patepar, pinatepar, pa. ipateparra, ipatepar, inipatepar, inoipatepar, to cause to lean.
ori-def_norm: zinummepar, tatummepar, teparra, teparran, zineparran, inoteparran, to lean on anything with the hand or arm. patepar, pinatepar, pa. ipateparra, ipatepar, inipatepar, inoipatepar, to cause to lean.

ori-def: zinummerap, tatummerap, terappa, terappen, zinerap, inoterappen, to lick. Paterap, pinaterap, papaterap, inoipaterap, to cause to lick.
ori-def_norm: zinummerap, tatummerap, terappa, terappen, zinerap, inoterappen, to lick. paterap, pinaterap, papaterap, inoipaterap, to cause to lick.

zh-def: 刺進（鹿）；標出記號、特徵（如人們把海豹壓在蠟上）
ori-def: zinummilla, tatummilla, itilla-a, initilla, inoitilla, to set in, to print in, to stick in, as people pierce a deer with a spear; or to imprint, as people press a seal on wax; while the impression is expressed by the pass. pret. of the verb initilla, that is, that which is impressed. It means also to cook food for children. Pûtilla, pinatilla, papûtilla, ipatilla, inipatilla, inoipatilla, to canse an impression to be made.
ori-def_norm: zinummilla, tatummilla, itilla-a, initilla, inoitilla, to set in, to print in, to stick in, as people pierce a deer with a spear; or to imprint, as people press a seal on wax; while the impression is expressed by the pass. pret. of the verb initilla, that is, that which is impressed. it means also to cook food for children. putilla, pinatilla, paputilla, ipatilla, inipatilla, inoipatilla, to canse an impression to be made.

ori-def: zinummillak, tatûmmillak, tillaggen, zinillag, inotillaggen, to appear, to seem. Patillak, pinatillak, papûtillak, ipatillagga, ipatillak, inoipatillak, to cause to appear.
ori-def_norm: zinummillak, tatummillak, tillaggen, zinillag, inotillaggen, to appear, to seem. patillak, pinatillak, paputillak, ipatillagga, ipatillak, inoipatillak, to cause to appear.

zh-def: 因單眼盲而讓人留下印象（眼白無法被看到）
ori-def: zinummillik, tatûmmillik, tillikka, tillikken, zinillik, inotillikken, to be struck with blindness in one eye, so that the white of the eye cannot be seen, for then it is tollassen, from tummollas. Patillik, pinatillik, papatillik, ipatillikka, ipatillik, inipatillik, inoipatillik, to cause such to be done. Tûtillik, such a blinding.
ori-def_norm: zinummillik, tatummillik, tillikka, tillikken, zinillik, inotillikken, to be struck with blindness in one eye, so that the white of the eye cannot be seen, for then it is tollassen, from tummollas. patillik, pinatillik, papatillik, ipatillikka, ipatillik, inipatillik, inoipatillik, to cause such to be done. tutillik, such a blinding.

zh-def: 做房屋地基；用一片木頭用力敲打
ori-def: to level the ground for the foundation of a house, and to beat it hard with flat pieces of wood.
ori-def_norm: to level the ground for the foundation of a house, and to beat it hard with flat pieces of wood.

ori-def: zinummittil, tatummittil, tittilla, tittillan, zinittillan, inotittillan, to beat in. Patiltil, pi. pa, ipatiltilla, ipatiltil, &c. to cause such to be done. Tattiltil, a nail or peg which people drive in, also the driving in itself.
ori-def_norm: zinummittil, tatummittil, tittilla, tittillan, zinittillan, inotittillan, to beat in. patiltil, pi. pa, ipatiltilla, ipatiltil, &c. to cause such to be done. tattiltil, a nail or peg which people drive in, also the driving in itself.

ori-def: tsi: tat: tirtirra, to tremble, Patirtir, transit: tattirtir, nom. a trembling.
ori-def_norm: tsi: tat: tirtirra, to tremble, patirtir, transit: tattirtir, nom. a trembling.

ori-def: zinummis, tatûmmis, itissa, itis, initis, inoitis, to throw away, to lose. Patis, pinatis, papatis, ipûtissa, ipatis, inipatis, inoipatis, to cause to be thrown away. Maatûttis, one who throws away.
ori-def_norm: zinummis, tatummis, itissa, itis, initis, inoitis, to throw away, to lose. patis, pinatis, papatis, iputissa, ipatis, inipatis, inoipatis, to cause to be thrown away. maatuttis, one who throws away.

ori-def: zinûmmissan, tatûmmissan, tissanna, to sigh. Patissan, pinatissan, papatissan, ipatissanna, ipatissan, inipatissan, inoipatissan, to cause to sigh. Tatissan, a sigh. Maatattissan, one who sighs.
ori-def_norm: zinummissan, tatummissan, tissanna, to sigh. patissan, pinatissan, papatissan, ipatissanna, ipatissan, inipatissan, inoipatissan, to cause to sigh. tatissan, a sigh. maatattissan, one who sighs.

ori-def: zinummo-ach, tatûmmo-ach, toacha, toûch-en, zino-ach-an, inotoach-an, to come out, to come to light. Thus the sun and moon are said tûmmo-ach, to rise; grass and vegetables, tûmmo-achibabota, to come above the ground; and men, tûmmoach ta, to come out into the street. Pûtoach, pinatoach, papûtoach, ipatoacha, ipatoach, inipatoach, inoipatoach, to cause such to be done. Tattoach, a rising, a coming up.
ori-def_norm: zinummo-ach, tatummo-ach, toacha, touch-en, zino-ach-an, inotoach-an, to come out, to come to light. thus the sun and moon are said tummo-ach, to rise; grass and vegetables, tummo-achibabota, to come above the ground; and men, tummoach ta, to come out into the street. putoach, pinatoach, paputoach, ipatoacha, ipatoach, inipatoach, inoipatoach, to cause such to be done. tattoach, a rising, a coming up.

ori-def: zinummo, tatummo, toa, toon, zino, inotoon, to reach out the hand to receive anything. Pato, pinato, papato, ipato, inipato, inoipato, to cause such to be done.
ori-def_norm: zinummo, tatummo, toa, toon, zino, inotoon, to reach out the hand to receive anything. pato, pinato, papato, ipato, inipato, inoipato, to cause such to be done.

ori-def: zinum-o, tatum-o, to-a, toûn, zino, inotoan, to pick, to stick. Tumo chirrap, to pick the teeth. Tûm-otaddarries, to put the key in a lock, to lock it up, the locking up itself. Also to gore, as a deer with his horns.
ori-def_norm: zinum-o, tatum-o, to-a, toun, zino, inotoan, to pick, to stick. tumo chirrap, to pick the teeth. tum-otaddarries, to put the key in a lock, to lock it up, the locking up itself. also to gore, as a deer with his horns.

ori-def: zinummoch, tatummoch, toch-a, tochen, zinoch, inotoch-en, to number. Tummoch o bido, to read. Patoch, pinatoch, papatoch, ipatoch-a, ipatoch, inipatoch, inoipatoch, to cause to be numbered.
ori-def_norm: zinummoch, tatummoch, toch-a, tochen, zinoch, inotoch-en, to number. tummoch o bido, to read. patoch, pinatoch, papatoch, ipatoch-a, ipatoch, inipatoch, inoipatoch, to cause to be numbered.

ori-def: zinummochab_, tatummochab, tochûbba, tochbàban, zinochabban, inotochabban, to make a hole. Pûtochab_, pinatochab_, papatochab, ipûtochabb_a, ipatochab_, inipatochab_, inoipatochab, to cause such to be done. Tattochab, the making a hole; tochab, a hole.
ori-def_norm: zinummochab_, tatummochab, tochubba, tochbaban, zinochabban, inotochabban, to make a hole. putochab_, pinatochab_, papatochab, iputochabb_a, ipatochab_, inipatochab_, inoipatochab, to cause such to be done. tattochab, the making a hole; tochab, a hole.

zh-def: 播種時用土把種子蓋住
ori-def: zinummod, tatummod, todda; (this passive is used respecting a field. Bonna todden, the field is planted. But itod, initod, inoitod, means the rice &c is sown;) todden, zinod, inotodden, cover the seed with earth when it is sown. Patod, pi, pa, ipûtodda, ipatod, &c. Tatod, the covering of that which is sown after the sowing. Taddodayan, the sowing time or place.
ori-def_norm: zinummod, tatummod, todda; (this passive is used respecting a field. bonna todden, the field is planted. but itod, initod, inoitod, means the rice &c is sown;) todden, zinod, inotodden, cover the seed with earth when it is sown. patod, pi, pa, iputodda, ipatod, &c. tatod, the covering of that which is sown after the sowing. taddodayan, the sowing time or place.

ori-def: zinummoelakkies, tatummoelakkies, toelakisa, toelakisen, zinoelakies, inotoelakkisen, to do anything unexpectedly; same as Poelakies. Tummoelakkies o poch o cho, to shoot a man suddenly. Tûmmoelakkies, o payach, o riba, to soil a coat unexpectedly. Patoelakkies, pi, pa, ipatoelakisa, ipatoelakies, inipatoelakies, inoipatoelakies, to cause such to be done. Tattoelakies, a mistake, a missing. Hence, kar tattoelakkies, mau tattoelakkies. Mà-atattoelakkies, one who misses.
ori-def_norm: zinummoelakkies, tatummoelakkies, toelakisa, toelakisen, zinoelakies, inotoelakkisen, to do anything unexpectedly; same as poelakies. tummoelakkies o poch o cho, to shoot a man suddenly. tummoelakkies, o payach, o riba, to soil a coat unexpectedly. patoelakkies, pi, pa, ipatoelakisa, ipatoelakies, inipatoelakies, inoipatoelakies, to cause such to be done. tattoelakies, a mistake, a missing. hence, kar tattoelakkies, mau tattoelakkies. ma-atattoelakkies, one who misses.

zh-def: 推翻; 絆倒;  顛倒; 敲門
ori-def: zinummok, tatummok, tokka, tokken, sinok, inotokken, to overthrow. Tummok o mallo, to upset a cup. Tummok o bato, to knock against a stone, to stumble. Tummok, o don, to knock at a house, or a door. Tummok o tazirrisan, to hit a nail or pin, in order to drive it in. Patok, pi, pa, ipatokka, ipatok, inipatok, inoipatok, to cause such to be done. Tattok, a knocking, also that wherewith we knoch. Tattok a oos, quasitattokaûs, the beat of a drum. Tattoksayan, the place where people beat, also the time when the gong is beaten.
ori-def_norm: zinummok, tatummok, tokka, tokken, sinok, inotokken, to overthrow. tummok o mallo, to upset a cup. tummok o bato, to knock against a stone, to stumble. tummok, o don, to knock at a house, or a door. tummok o tazirrisan, to hit a nail or pin, in order to drive it in. patok, pi, pa, ipatokka, ipatok, inipatok, inoipatok, to cause such to be done. tattok, a knocking, also that wherewith we knoch. tattok a oos, quasitattokaus, the beat of a drum. tattoksayan, the place where people beat, also the time when the gong is beaten.

ori-def: tsi, ta tokkóa, tokkoûn, pass. &c. to heat up, to lay in a heap. Patokko, to cause such to done. Tokko, a heap.
ori-def_norm: tsi, ta tokkoa, tokkoun, pass. &c. to heat up, to lay in a heap. patokko, to cause such to done. tokko, a heap.

ori-def: zinum: tatum: tókkotokka, tokkotokken, zinokkotok, inotokkotokken, the redoubling of tummok. Patokkotok, pi, pa, ipûtokkotokka, ipatokkotok, &c. the redoubling of patok.
ori-def_norm: zinum: tatum: tokkotokka, tokkotokken, zinokkotok, inotokkotokken, the redoubling of tummok. patokkotok, pi, pa, iputokkotokka, ipatokkotok, &c. the redoubling of patok.

ori-def: tsinûmmolillis, tatummolillis, (imp. tollalisa,part. tollolissen, tsinullllolis, inottollolissen, nom. tollalis, a spark, a bit of fire,) to give out sparks, as red hot iron does when it is beaten. Patollilis, pi, pa, ipatolollossa., ipûtolillis, inipatolillis, inoipatolillis, to cause to give out sparks.
ori-def_norm: tsinummolillis, tatummolillis, (imp. tollalisa,part. tollolissen, tsinullllolis, inottollolissen, nom. tollalis, a spark, a bit of fire,) to give out sparks, as red hot iron does when it is beaten. patollilis, pi, pa, ipatolollossa., iputolillis, inipatolillis, inoipatolillis, to cause to give out sparks.

ori-def: tsi: tat: tullalla-a, tûllallaan, tsinullalla-an, the blossoming of trees: inotullalallû-an. Patullalla, transitiv. Tallalla, nom. blossom.
ori-def_norm: tsi: tat: tullalla-a, tullallaan, tsinullalla-an, the blossoming of trees: inotullalallu-an. patullalla, transitiv. tallalla, nom. blossom.

zh-def: 一隻眼睛瞎掉，但可以看到眼白
ori-def: tsi, tat, tollassa, tollassen, tsinollûs, inotollassen, to be blind of one eye, but so as that the white can be seen. Patollas, trans. Tattollas, such blindness.
ori-def_norm: tsi, tat, tollassa, tollassen, tsinollus, inotollassen, to be blind of one eye, but so as that the white can be seen. patollas, trans. tattollas, such blindness.

zh-def: 生火; 點蠟燭; 使發光
ori-def: zinummollo, tatummollo, tollóa, tolloan, zinolloan, inotolloan, to set on fire. Tummollo, tatollo, to light a candle. Patóllo, pinatollo, papûtollo, ipatolloa, ipatollo, inipatollo, inoipatollo, to cause to be lighted; nom. tattollo, a candle.
ori-def_norm: zinummollo, tatummollo, tolloa, tolloan, zinolloan, inotolloan, to set on fire. tummollo, tatollo, to light a candle. patollo, pinatollo, paputollo, ipatolloa, ipatollo, inipatollo, inoipatollo, to cause to be lighted; nom. tattollo, a candle.

ori-def: zinummoltol, tatûmmoltol, toltolla, toltollan, zinoltollan, inotoltollan, to smoke with a whisp of straw, called tattoltol, in order to drive away the moschettoes. Patoltol, pinûtoltol, papûtoltol, ipatoltolla, ipatoltol, inipatoltol, to cause such to be done.
ori-def_norm: zinummoltol, tatummoltol, toltolla, toltollan, zinoltollan, inotoltollan, to smoke with a whisp of straw, called tattoltol, in order to drive away the moschettoes. patoltol, pinutoltol, paputoltol, ipatoltolla, ipatoltol, inipatoltol, to cause such to be done.

zh-def: 海或河第一次水位上升
ori-def: tsi: tat: tonnoga, tomnogan, tsinonog, innotonnogan, the first rising of the water in the sea or rivers, Tmmonok sai o to, de abas, desabba. Tattonnog, nom. the commencement of flood tide.
ori-def_norm: tsi: tat: tonnoga, tomnogan, tsinonog, innotonnogan, the first rising of the water in the sea or rivers, tmmonok sai o to, de abas, desabba. tattonnog, nom. the commencement of flood tide.

ori-def: zinummoob, tattûmmoob, itòbo, itoob, initoob, inoitoob, to sprinkle water, also to sprinkle with the same, when it is toba, tóban, zinoban, inotoban. Patoob, pinatoob, papûtoob, ipûtoba, ipatoob, inipatoob, inoipatoob, to cause to be sprinkled.
ori-def_norm: zinummoob, tattummoob, itobo, itoob, initoob, inoitoob, to sprinkle water, also to sprinkle with the same, when it is toba, toban, zinoban, inotoban. patoob, pinatoob, paputoob, iputoba, ipatoob, inipatoob, inoipatoob, to cause to be sprinkled.

ori-def: zinummo-ol, tatûmmo-ol, toolla, to-ollan, zino-ollan, inoto-ollon, same as tummollo. Pato-ol, pi, pa, ipato-olla, ipato-ol, &c. same as Patollo.
ori-def_norm: zinummo-ol, tatummo-ol, toolla, to-ollan, zino-ollan, inoto-ollon, same as tummollo. pato-ol, pi, pa, ipato-olla, ipato-ol, &c. same as patollo.

ori-def: ziniummoos, tattummoos, tosa, tosan, zinosan, inotósan, where with? itoos, initoos, inoitoos, to rub. Patoos, pinatoos, papatoos, ipûtosa, ipatoos, intipatoos, inoipatoos, to cause to be rubbed. Tûmmóostoos, intend.
ori-def_norm: ziniummoos, tattummoos, tosa, tosan, zinosan, inotosan, where with? itoos, initoos, inoitoos, to rub. patoos, pinatoos, papatoos, iputosa, ipatoos, intipatoos, inoipatoos, to cause to be rubbed. tummoostoos, intend.

ori-def: zinummorraich, tattummorraich, torraicha, torraichen, zinorraich, inotorraichen, to slide, or slip of, to slide out. Pûtorraich, pi, pa, ipatorraicha, ipatorraich, inipatorraich, inoipatorraich, to cause such to be done.
ori-def_norm: zinummorraich, tattummorraich, torraicha, torraichen, zinorraich, inotorraichen, to slide, or slip of, to slide out. putorraich, pi, pa, ipatorraicha, ipatorraich, inipatorraich, inoipatorraich, to cause such to be done.

ori-def: zinummorrik, tatummorrik, torrika, torriken, zinorrik, inotorriken, to tell lies. Pûtorrik, pinatorrik, papatorrik, ipatorrikka, ipatorrik, inipatorrik, inoipatorrik, to cause to lie.
ori-def_norm: zinummorrik, tatummorrik, torrika, torriken, zinorrik, inotorriken, to tell lies. putorrik, pinatorrik, papatorrik, ipatorrikka, ipatorrik, inipatorrik, inoipatorrik, to cause to lie.

zh-def: 閃爍；像螢火蟲在黑暗中一樣發光
ori-def: tsi: tat: torritorria, torritorrian, tsinotorritorri, inotorritorrian, to flicker, to glitter as the fire flies in the dark, also as the stars in the night. Tummaitas, idem. Pataitas, idem. Patorritorri, trans. Torritorri, nom. a glittering, also a fire fly. Taitai, idem.
ori-def_norm: tsi: tat: torritorria, torritorrian, tsinotorritorri, inotorritorrian, to flicker, to glitter as the fire flies in the dark, also as the stars in the night. tummaitas, idem. pataitas, idem. patorritorri, trans. torritorri, nom. a glittering, also a fire fly. taitai, idem.

ori-def: zinummorritorrik, tatummerritorrik, torritorrikka, torritorrikken, zinorritorrik, inotorritorrikken, idem. Patorritorrik, an increase of tûmmorrik.
ori-def_norm: zinummorritorrik, tatummerritorrik, torritorrikka, torritorrikken, zinorritorrik, inotorritorrikken, idem. patorritorrik, an increase of tummorrik.

zh-def: 漏；從屋頂、毀壞船隻等漏出
ori-def: zinummorro, tatummorro, torroan, zinorroan, inotorroan, to leak, to leak out, either through roofs or through broken vessels and so forth. Patorro, pinatorro, papatorro, ipatorroa, ipatorro, inipatorro, inoipatorro, &c. Tummorrotorro, intend.

ori-def: tsi: tat: torrocha, torrochen, tsinorroch, inotorrochen, to drag, to pull after one, neutr. Patorroch, trans. to draw, activ. to cause to be drawn. Tattorroch, nom. a dragging. Tummorrotorroch, intend.

ori-def:
zinummose, tatummose, toséa, tosein, zinose, inotosein, same as tummorrik; patose, pinatose, papatose, ipatosea, ipûtose, inipatose, inoipatose, same as patorrik. Tummosetose and
patosetose, same as tummorritorrik and patorritorrik.

zinummose, tatummose, tosea, tosein, zinose, inotosein, same as tummorrik; patose, pinatose, papatose, ipatosea, iputose, inipatose, inoipatose, same as patorrik. tummosetose and

ori-def: tsi: tat: tôtta, to let wind. Patot, to cause such to done. Tottat, foul wind.
ori-def_norm: tsi: tat: totta, to let wind. patot, to cause such to done. tottat, foul wind.

ori-def: zinummotto, tatummotto, tottoa, tottoon zinótto, inotottoon, to forge, to beat any thing to powder. Patotto, pinatotto, papatotto, ipaitottoa, ipatotto, inipatotto, inoipatotto, to cause such to be done.

zh-def: 發芽；果實在花落後發芽
ori-def: tsi: tat: tottoa, tottoòn, tsinotto, inotottoon, the budding, or shooting forth of the fruit after the blossoms fall off.
ori-def_norm: tsi: tat: tottoa, tottoon, tsinotto, inotottoon, the budding, or shooting forth of the fruit after the blossoms fall off.

ori-def: zinumpa, tatumpa, tuppa, tuppûan, zienpa, inotuppaan, to think, to reflect. Patuppa, pi, pa, ipatuppa, inipatuppa, inoipatuppa, to cause to to think. Tumpatuppa, intend. Tattuppa, thoughts. Maatattuppa, one who thinks.

ori-def_norm: tsi, ta, tupporra, tupporren, tsienpor, inotupporren, the hatching of birds. putuppor, transiti. tatuppor, nom. a hatching.

ori-def: zinumpuk, tattumpuk, tuppukka, tuppukken, zienpuk, inotuppuken, to count, to reckon up any thing in the mind. Patuppuk, pinatuppuk, pa. ipatuppukka, ipatuppuk, &c.

The running out of paddy or such like article through a sack: the place where it leaks is tirrachan, zinirrachan, ino. &c. Patirrach, pi, pa, ipatirracha. &c.

ori-def: tsi: ta: tsarra, to stick, to stab. Tumsar o binnan, to stab a deer with a spear.
ori-def_norm: tsi: ta: tsarra, to stick, to stab. tumsar o binnan, to stab a deer with a spear.

ori-def: tsi: tat: tsika, tsiken, tsinick, inotsiken, to stain, to spot. Patsik, transit. Tatsik, a spot.

ori-def: fish. Tsi ballai, all sorts of small fish, catfish. Tsisàbbi, carp. I'si meried, eels. Tsi maarrát, shellfish. Tsi rodo, cod. Tsi tarra boetsina, a roach: tsi tarra pagaoûbaas, a sword fish. Tsi taiáûs, a sand-creeper. Tsi rócot, a smelt. Tsi teen, a fish, that has scales like the carp, but smaller. Tsi kabea, almost like the teen, but smaller. Tsi taddai, a sole. Tsi taddadach, a Chinese fish, full of bones. Tsi tillabis, a bream. Tai paûsosan, a broad fish with a sharp nose, transparent and soft. Tsi abaas, a shark. Tsi oàr, almost like a shellfish. Tsi o bioog, a kind of sprat
